property.name: title
property.value: Transactional Security

property.name: description
property.value: Simple security settings to restrict access to transactional methods (InsertSensor, InsertObservation, etc.). Users requiring more control over security should use 52°North WSS.

property.name: title
property.value: Transactional security active

property.name: description
property.value: Activate/Deactivate transactional security support. If true, allowed IPs or token should be defined! If allowed IPs and/or authorization token are defined, then incoming transactional requests are checked against them.

property.name: title
property.value: Transactional Allowed IPs

property.name: description
property.value: Comma separated ranges of IPs that should be allowed to make transactional requests. Use CIDR notation or raw IP addresses (e.g. 127.0.0.1,192.168.0.0/16). Subnet notation is also supported (e.g. 192.168.0.0/255.255.0.0). Leading zeros are not allowed.

property.name: title
property.value: Allowed Proxy IPs

property.name: description
property.value: Comma seperated list of allowed proxy IP addresses. These will be used to authorize allowed transactional IP addresses behind proxy servers. If not set 127.0.0.1 would be set per default.

property.name: title
property.value: Transactional authorization token

property.name: description
property.value: Authorization token to require for transactional requests. Specified in the HTTP Authorization header (Authorization: {token}).

property.name: description
property.value: Settings for the transactional operations

property.name: title
property.value: Delete observation or procedure physically

property.name: description
property.value: Should the SOS delete the observation or procedure physically or only set deleted flag.

property.name: title
property.value: Insert/add the data additionlly as profile data

property.name: description
property.value: Should the SOS insert/add the data additionlly as profile data.

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS create the featureOfInterest geometry from samplingGeometries?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should create the featureOfInterest geometry from samplingGeometries.

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS update the featureOfInterest geometry with samplingGeometries geometry?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should expand the featureOfInterest geometry with the samplingGeometry from the inserted observation. Note: The geometries are added to the end of the LineString! Also if the new observation is between existing observations!

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS allow the insertion of procedure and featureOfInterest via InsertResult values?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should allow to reference the procedure and featureOfInterest in the values of the InsertResult operation instead in the observationTemplate!

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS abort the InsertResult if an observation already exist but others not?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should abort the InsertResult if an observation already exist in the databse but others are new. Default is that the insertion would be stopped!
